Package maze.core.solver

Class Solver

java.lang.Object
maze.core.solver.Solver
Direct Known Subclasses:
DFS
public class Solver extends Object
The main solving class that uses DFS to calculate how to finish a maze Litterally the worst code ever made, needs refactoring
Author:
Hudson

    • neighbours

      public boolean[] neighbours(int tileLocationX, int tileLocationY, Maze myMaze)
      gets the neighbours of the current tile in a boolean array starting from 3 o'clock and moving anti-clockwise
      Parameters:
      tileLocationX - Location of the tile row-wise
      tileLocationY - Location of the tile column-wise
      myMaze - Maze that the position is
      Returns:
      boolean array of 4 values for determining if neighbours are valid

    • DFS

      public Integer[] DFS(Maze gb, Integer[] position)
      Depth First Search Algorithim that recursively calls itself until it reaches the end or everything is a dead end
      Parameters:
      gb - Maze to solve
      position - The position going into before solving further
      Returns:
      The new position the search has chosen to go to based off of position and current explored maze
